    0 rem ************************
    1 rem ***    list - stop   ***

    5 rem ***   neumuenster    ***
    6 rem ************************
    7 rem
    8 rem
   10 poke56,159:poke55,0:clr:a=40703
   20 a=a+1:readb:s=s+b:ifb=-1then40
   30 pokea,b:goto20
   40 ifs<>24817thenprint"fehler in data's !":end
   50 sys40704:new
  100 rem
  105 rem *** data's fuer list-stop ***
  110 rem
  111 data169,19,141,8,3,169,159,141,9,3,141,1,3,169,185,141,0,3,96,32,115
